info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37669
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;opentermsarchive.org.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37669
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 5, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;opentermsarchive.org.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
opentermsarchive.org.	3600	IN	MX	100 mx3.mail.ovh.net.
opentermsarchive.org.	3600	IN	MX	50 mx2.mail.ovh.net.
opentermsarchive.org.	3600	IN	MX	1 mx0.mail.ovh.net.
opentermsarchive.org.	3600	IN	MX	5 mx1.mail.ovh.net.
opentermsarchive.org.	3600	IN	MX	40 mx4.mail.ovh.net.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 35625
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;opentermsarchive.org.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 35625
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;opentermsarchive.org.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
opentermsarchive.org.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com ~all"
opentermsarchive.org.	600	IN	TXT	"1|www.opentermsarchive.org"

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 28122
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;opentermsarchive.org.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 28122
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;opentermsarchive.org.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
opentermsarchive.org.	60	IN	SOA	dns102.ovh.net. tech.ovh.net. 2023113000 86400 3600 3600000 60

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8208
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;opentermsarchive.org.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8208
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232
; EDE: 18 (Prohibited): ()

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;opentermsarchive.org.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
opentermsarchive.org.	3600	IN	NS	ns102.ovh.net.
opentermsarchive.org.	3600	IN	NS	dns102.ovh.net.

request:
OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: opentermsarchive.org
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Allow: GET, HEAD Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://stats.data.gouv.fr; object-src 'none'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' data: https://media-exp1.licdn.com https://www.gravatar.com https://avatars.githubusercontent.com https://pbs.twimg.com https://sibyll.in; frame-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 24 Dec 2023 15:57:51 GMT Etag: "vgf473q91s3fg" Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Powered-By: Next.js X-Request-Id: 1ba399ed-ebe7-42aa-b3bd-b7b3ff96d3fd X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 405: Method Not Allowed

405

Method Not Allowed.

  • Home

  • Impact
  • About
FR

Big Tech services benefit from the opaqueness of their terms.
We make them transparent.

Open Terms Archive publicly records every version of the terms of digital services to enable democratic oversight. Discover how that makes a difference →

Recognised as Digital Public Good by UNDP, UNICEF and Norad
Featured as “Open-Source Innovation for Information Integrity” at the Nobel Prize Summit 2023
Selected as Solution by the Paris Peace Forum 2020

We establish partnerships to track the terms of many industries, in several languages and jurisdictions

Generative AI

Most popular generative AI services
Services

Documents

Jurisdictions

Major global social media services

Jurisdiction
European Union

P2B Compliance

Online intermediation services for businesses subject to the European platforms-to-businesses (“P2B” / 2019/1150) regulation
Services
208

253

European Union
Jurisdiction
European Union

France Élections

Most used social media in France that could have a systemic impact on the 2022 elections

Jurisdiction
European Union
Want to track services for different languages, jurisdictions, or industries? Contact us to collaborate!

Follow #TermsSpotting

Found some interesting changes? Share them with #TermsSpotting! Follow us for such finds and for news from Open Terms Archive and its ecosystem.

How it works

1. Targeting

The terms of use of a service are targeted by contributors.

2. Tracking

Several times a day, our robots download and publicly archive the targeted documents.

3. Analysing

When changes are spotted, they are recorded and exposed for human analysts.

4. Disseminating

We publish all versions in datasets enabling reuse and research.

Built with Open Terms Archive

Tools created by the community to shift the power balance from big tech towards end users.

Research on the impact on human rights

Research paper on the impact on human rights of the evolution of social media terms of use.
Lab-LEX, Université de Brest

French Elections Memos

Tracks major platforms behaviour over the French 2022 elections.
Reset

Terms of Service; Didn’t Read

Lets users collaboratively rate how respectful terms of services are of their rights.
ToS;DR

Documents Readability

Computes the readability and necessary education level to understand a contractual document.
Office of the French Ambassador for Digital Affairs

Scripta Manent

Consolidates all changes to a document between two dates.
Office of the French Ambassador for Digital Affairs

TOSback

The ancestor of Open Terms Archive! Since October 2020, changes displayed are provided by a dedicated Open Terms Archive collection.
ToS;DR

Your Tool

If you want to build a tool with Open Terms Archive, contact us!

Follow the evolutions of Open Terms Archive

No terms changes, only news about the product and its partners! Two emails a month at most, often less than that.

Contributive Digital Common

Open Terms Archive is free and open source software. Any entity can reuse and build upon it, as long as it shares its improvements with the community. The product is built collaboratively by all those who use and contribute to it.

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: opentermsarchive.org
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: s-maxage=31536000, stale-while-revalidate Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://stats.data.gouv.fr; object-src 'none'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' data: https://media-exp1.licdn.com https://www.gravatar.com https://avatars.githubusercontent.com https://pbs.twimg.com https://sibyll.in; frame-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 24 Dec 2023 15:58:27 GMT Etag: "h756mn5f8c1yrl" Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Nextjs-Cache: HIT X-Powered-By: Next.js X-Request-Id: 01fbf920-cb9f-4bec-8f55-338fbe7b2a0b X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Open Terms Archive
  • Home
  • Datasets
  • Documentation
  • Impact
  • About
FR

Big Tech services benefit from the opaqueness of their terms.
We make them transparent.

Open Terms Archive publicly records every version of the terms of digital services to enable democratic oversight. Discover how that makes a difference →

Recognised as Digital Public Good by UNDP, UNICEF and Norad
Featured as “Open-Source Innovation for Information Integrity” at the Nobel Prize Summit 2023
Selected as Solution by the Paris Peace Forum 2020

We establish partnerships to track the terms of many industries, in several languages and jurisdictions

Generative AI

Most popular generative AI services
Services
12
Documents
28
Language
English
Jurisdictions
European Union, China

Platform Governance Archive

Major global social media services
Services
20
Documents
80
Language
English
Jurisdiction
European Union

P2B Compliance

Online intermediation services for businesses subject to the European platforms-to-businesses (“P2B” / 2019/1150) regulation
Services
208
Documents
253
Language
European Union
Jurisdiction
European Union

France Élections

Most used social media in France that could have a systemic impact on the 2022 elections
Services
5
Documents
65
Language
French
Jurisdiction
France

Dating

Online dating
Services
25
Documents
65
Language
English
Jurisdictions
European Union, Switzerland

France

Largest digital services used in France
Services
108
Documents
216
Language
French
Jurisdiction
France

Contrib

Documents added by volunteer contributors and historically imported from TOSBack.org
Services
299
Documents
660
Languages
English, French
Jurisdictions
European Union, United States

Demo

Services needed to operate the Open Terms Archive engine
Services
2
Documents
6
Language
English
Jurisdiction
European Union
Want to track services for different languages, jurisdictions, or industries? Contact us to collaborate!

Follow #TermsSpotting

Found some interesting changes? Share them with #TermsSpotting! Follow us for such finds and for news from Open Terms Archive and its ecosystem.

How it works

1. Targeting

The terms of use of a service are targeted by contributors.

2. Tracking

Several times a day, our robots download and publicly archive the targeted documents.

3. Analysing

When changes are spotted, they are recorded and exposed for human analysts.

4. Disseminating

We publish all versions in datasets enabling reuse and research.

Built with Open Terms Archive

Tools created by the community to shift the power balance from big tech towards end users.

Research on the impact on human rights

Research paper on the impact on human rights of the evolution of social media terms of use.
Lab-LEX, Université de Brest

French Elections Memos

Tracks major platforms behaviour over the French 2022 elections.
Reset

Terms of Service; Didn’t Read

Lets users collaboratively rate how respectful terms of services are of their rights.
ToS;DR

Documents Readability

Computes the readability and necessary education level to understand a contractual document.
Office of the French Ambassador for Digital Affairs

Scripta Manent

Consolidates all changes to a document between two dates.
Office of the French Ambassador for Digital Affairs

TOSback

The ancestor of Open Terms Archive! Since October 2020, changes displayed are provided by a dedicated Open Terms Archive collection.
ToS;DR

Your Tool

If you want to build a tool with Open Terms Archive, contact us!

Follow the evolutions of Open Terms Archive

No terms changes, only news about the product and its partners! Two emails a month at most, often less than that.

Contributive Digital Common

Open Terms Archive is free and open source software. Any entity can reuse and build upon it, as long as it shares its improvements with the community. The product is built collaboratively by all those who use and contribute to it.

  • Impact
  • About

FR

Big Tech services benefit from the opaqueness of their terms.
We make them transparent.

Open Terms Archive publicly records every version of the terms of digital services to enable democratic oversight. Discover how that makes a difference →

Recognised as Digital Public Good by UNDP, UNICEF and Norad
Featured as “Open-Source Innovation for Information Integrity” at the Nobel Prize Summit 2023
Selected as Solution by the Paris Peace Forum 2020

We establish partnerships to track the terms of many industries, in several languages and jurisdictions

Want to track services for different languages, jurisdictions, or industries? Contact us to collaborate!

Follow #TermsSpotting

Found some interesting changes? Share them with #TermsSpotting! Follow us for such finds and for news from Open Terms Archive and its ecosystem.

How it works

1. Targeting

The terms of use of a service are targeted by contributors.

2. Tracking

Several times a day, our robots download and publicly archive the targeted documents.

3. Analysing

When changes are spotted, they are recorded and exposed for human analysts.

4. Disseminating

We publish all versions in datasets enabling reuse and research.

Built with Open Terms Archive

Tools created by the community to shift the power balance from big tech towards end users.

Research on the impact on human rights

Research paper on the impact on human rights of the evolution of social media terms of use.
Lab-LEX, Université de Brest

French Elections Memos

Tracks major platforms behaviour over the French 2022 elections.
Reset

Terms of Service; Didn’t Read

Lets users collaboratively rate how respectful terms of services are of their rights.
ToS;DR

Documents Readability

Computes the readability and necessary education level to understand a contractual document.
Office of the French Ambassador for Digital Affairs

Scripta Manent

Consolidates all changes to a document between two dates.
Office of the French Ambassador for Digital Affairs

TOSback

The ancestor of Open Terms Archive! Since October 2020, changes displayed are provided by a dedicated Open Terms Archive collection.
ToS;DR

Your Tool

If you want to build a tool with Open Terms Archive, contact us!

Follow the evolutions of Open Terms Archive

No terms changes, only news about the product and its partners! Two emails a month at most, often less than that.

Contributive Digital Common

Open Terms Archive is free and open source software. Any entity can reuse and build upon it, as long as it shares its improvements with the community. The product is built collaboratively by all those who use and contribute to it.

info.name: RDAP WHOIS
author: ricardomaia
sttlr
info.description:
RDAP (Registration Data Access Protocol) is a standard defined by the IETF to replace the whois protocol
in queries for information about Internet resource records such as domain names, IP addresses, and ASNs.

Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: opentermsarchive.org
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Allow: GET, HEAD Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://stats.data.gouv.fr; object-src 'none'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' data: https://media-exp1.licdn.com https://www.gravatar.com https://avatars.githubusercontent.com https://pbs.twimg.com https://sibyll.in; frame-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 24 Dec 2023 15:58:50 GMT Etag: "vgf473q91s3fg" Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Powered-By: Next.js X-Request-Id: b241d8a2-0251-4d95-a6a5-7d0085c080ef X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 405: Method Not Allowed

405

Method Not Allowed.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: opentermsarchive.org' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://opentermsarchive.org/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
